column4: m0rpheus-> yes you log on to the windows server from the ubuntu..then you will see exact same things as if you were using a windows client that logged on to same server
Amaranth-> you can burn the same cd iso to dvd?  you possibly can burn it, but i doubt it if you can boot the same.. eltorito is only for cdrom and not for dvd rom (but i stand corrected if am wrong)
m0rpheus-> then you have to understand what route are you adding and to which router or host are you adding it to.
